授業目的:
The subtitle of this course is - Exploring Spoken English.
The purpose of this course to explore English spoken language.
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the pragmatic meaning in conversations.
Students will be able to understand organizational principles of conversation.

第1回: Homework - students will be asked to write 2 conversations
第4回: Agreement - A great place to visit
第7回: Disagreement - Recounting a story in pairs
第12回: Practice - students practice a topic of their own choice
第13回: Practice - students practice a topic of their own choice
